justification: Proposal ignores Team B’s stated preference for workhorse RBs and established, reliable talent; it offers a WR2 and TE4 for B’s elite but injured TE1. It also overlooks B’s WR depth and urgent need for immediate, dependable production at thin positions. Team A’s conservative, injury-averse profile clashes with targeting a Doubtful TE. Rationale centers only on A’s goals and provides no B-focused reasoning, making acceptance probability overstated and the logic underdeveloped.
